title.rendered: TrailMax Roof Rack System – Ford Everest 2015-2018

content.rendered:
TrailMax Roof Rack System to suit Ford Everest.

 

Our TrailMax roof rack system to suit the Ford Everest looks so good. Our design is tough, aggressive and yet follows the Everest’s original lines and profile. It’s streamline and yet fully practical for mounting anything for your next job or adventure.

Our Ford Everest roof rack system includes the option to install our slimline 20” LED light bar in the rear.

Best of all however is its compatibility for our 32” HD Combat light bar in the front. Our HD LED light bar will fit flush meaning it won’t interfere with the mounting of anything overhanging the front of the rack. Our design is also much more streamlined than most allowing for less wind resistance, better economy and less wind noise. Due to popular request we have now also added ability to mount our small HD Pod lights in the side to provide additional side lighting under your awning or even just while night driving in the bush.

Our TrailMax roof rack system is designed to be versatile and many accessories from other racks are able to be mounted directly to our TrailMax system. This means you can swap over to our roof rack system on your new car and still use all the mounting accessories you may have purchased for other brand racks.

 

  • Load capacity – Dynamic 100kg, Static 300kg
  • Made from zinc coated and then powder coated mild steel and powder coated Aluminium side.
  • Custom “No Drill” mounting brackets to save install time and integrates with original rail system mounting holes.
  • Includes 2 x Tie down straps.
  • Fully Compatible with our 32″ HD Combat light in front (includes brackets)
  • Fully Compatible with our 20” Slimline light in rear (includes brackets)
  • Fully Compatible with our pod lights in the side section

(wiring harness not included)

excerpt.rendered:
TrailMax Roof Rack System – Everest 2015-2018

 

If “OUT  OF  STOCK” please enquire.
